# licenses

Add, delete, and list licenses

Aliases:

* license

## Usage

```console
coder licenses
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                        | Purpose                           |
|---------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| [<code>add</code>](./licenses_add)       | Add license to Coder deployment   |
| [<code>list</code>](./licenses_list)     | List licenses (including expired) |
| [<code>delete</code>](./licenses_delete) | Delete license by ID              |
